title: Kindred's end
body:
So one day the hunters must end like everything that drops breath...
Lamb would never run from Wolf.But Wolf must end too...
Lamb will shoot an arrow into the air above her while Wolf devours her and when the arrow that was shot in the air hits wolf, that will be truly the end .

replies.body: I'd venture that the day Wolf eats Lamb we're all pretty much in deep crap.
GDI I saw this in Redtracker and now I want a Gyro....

> [{quoted}](name=nosafterburn,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=R8uzEgdN,comment-id=00030002,timestamp=2018-03-15T23:38:27.419+0000)
>
> GDI I saw this in Redtracker and now I want a Gyro....

I just ate gyro in your honor.
i hope it was delicious  {{sticker:sg-poppy}} (I'm completely jealous btw)
IF Wolf ever did that, and got lonely over time, and split himself with an axe, which new two deaths would we end up with then?
goode boye and bad boye

> [{quoted}](name=Illâoi Evê Siôn,realm=EUW,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=R8uzEgdN,comment-id=00030000,timestamp=2018-03-15T17:58:13.648+0000)
>
> IF Wolf ever did that, and got lonely over time, and split himself with an axe, which new two deaths would we end up with then?

But if that arrow hits him and he dies too would he be lonely ¿

> [{quoted}](name=FauxSchizzle,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=R8uzEgdN,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2018-03-15T17:53:05.719+0000)
>
> I'd venture that the day Wolf eats Lamb we're all pretty much in deep crap.

We all would be dead everything would be..Only the Kindred itself would be that last thing that stands until that moment ...
{{sticker:zombie-nunu-bummed}}

Mordekaiser becomes the "deity" of death in Runeterra.
Hue{{champion:82}} hue{{champion:82}} hue{{champion:82}} hue{{champion:82}} hue{{champion:82}} hue{{champion:82}} hue{{champion:82}} hue.
I don't think the embodiment of death breathes.

> [{quoted}](name=ALAEDDINE122,realm=EUW,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=R8uzEgdN,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2018-03-13T17:38:35.189+0000)
>
> I don't think the embodiment of death breathes.

Breathing or not.Still they have to meet their end
Why?

> [{quoted}](name=WOOOOOOOOHOOOOOO,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=R8uzEgdN,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2018-03-13T19:08:46.640+0000)
>
> Why?

All things have an end.

> [{quoted}](name=ALAEDDINE122,realm=EUW,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=R8uzEgdN,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2018-03-13T17:38:35.189+0000)
>
> I don't think the embodiment of death breathes.

I don't think it is said that Kindred are Death it self...For what we know they are spirits..

nah, they are just going to become one again

{{sticker:sg-jinx}}

> [{quoted}](name=Toppien,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=R8uzEgdN,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2018-03-13T19:07:50.390+0000)
>
> nah, they are just going to become one again
> 
> {{sticker:sg-jinx}}

When something ends a new thing begins.
Kindred is an immortal aspect it can't die, and she is also a really hot furry sheep girl so the wolf definately wouldn't do anything bad to her
if death/fate dies im sure that can't be good

> [{quoted}](name=M00ndanc3,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=R8uzEgdN,comment-id=0005,timestamp=2018-03-16T00:02:22.945+0000)
>
> if death/fate dies im sure that can't be good

that is the end...
